head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BORZATTI, CAPTAIN B. JOHN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BORZATTI, CAPTAIN B. JOHN

block.p: BORZATTI-Captain B. John, of West New York, New Jersey, on Monday January 20, 1997. Beloved husband of the late Catherine (nee Radonich) Borzatti. Funeral service Friday, January 24, at 12:30 PM at the Vainieri Funeral Home, 5923 Kennedy Boulevard (corner of 60th Street), North Bergen, NJ. Interment in Madonna Cemetery, Fort Lee, NJ. Visitation Friday 11AM-1PM. Parking on premises.

Visitation Friday 11AM-1PM. Parking on premises.
